document_data.name: Traveler's Guide to Silverymoon – Inns, Taverns, and Local Law
document_data.author: [[Imgath Gland]], [[Sagreth Kormun]]
document_data.released: Before [[1370 DR]]{{Cite organized play/RPGA/The Mad Mage's Revenge|3}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Traveler's Guide to Silverymoon – Inns, Taverns, and Local Law''''' was a [[book|guidebook]] to the city of [[Silverymoon]], the Gem of the North, that came out from under the [[quill]]s of two authors, [[Imgath Gland]] and [[Sagreth Kormun]] sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: A copy of ''Traveler's Guide to Silverymoon'' belonged to [[Manshoon XII]], a clone of [[Manshoon]], in the {{YearlinkName|1370}}. The book was stored in the [[mage]]'s library of mundane and [[arcane]] tomes in his lair in an abandoned temple of [[Amaunator]] underneath the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]] of [[Waterdeep]].
